oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial view of Nashville and the Cumberland River, 1957 July 20
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An aerial view of Nashville, Tennessee, July 20th, 1957. Also pictured, the Cumberland River near downtown. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Rivers--Tennessee--Nashville; Skyscrapers--Tennessee--Nashville; Office buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Bridges--Tennessee--Nashville
